page.title: 02A Day in the Life of Joanne
page.content: We sometimes play tick but mostly I justwalk around with my friend and talk.We go back into class at five to eleven.We have our sandwiches at twelve o'clock.Some people have hot dinners and some have sandwiches.We go outside after dinner and play.We go back into school at twenty past one and then we might do some History or something.We go out to play at twenty to three and come back in at a ten to three.We go home at ten to four.I usually walk home with my friend unless she has cycling proficiency.It usually takes about twenty five minutes to get home.When I get home I play with my friend and at about five o'clock I have my tea.
